author: Kyle Orland
title: Despite closures, GameStop says it’s seeing increased demand amid pandemic
description: Retailer still predicts tough times ahead until holiday console launches, though.
content:
Enlarge/ Ah, for the carefree days when you could wander into a GameStop and not worry about keeping six feet from other shoppers...
